name: Mirrored Soul (mammothplant)
description: Mirrored Soul is an RPG inspired by the likes of Shin Megami Tensei, MOTHER, and classic Pokemon. The story stars out-of-practice detective Cecel and his one-eyed feline sidekick, the enigmatic Spot. Traverse dimensions, recruit monsters or shake 'em down for information, fuse your creatures to create new ones, and take down the armies of the shadowy Mirrorlord  -- and maybe do some sleuthing here and there.
